availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James D. Benson (Union County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, farmer. Union County native. Son of Enoch Berry Benson and Elizabeth Dillon Benson. Married to Nancy A. Benson. Father of Sarah E. Benson and Mary Benson. Owned two enslaved persons in Union County in 1850. Farmer in Union County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union, District 1.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union, p. 65.
